characters/armon.html.title: Armon
characters/armon.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Spirit Speak 🟥 Yes Armon is known for being a GravekeeperThey specialize in Spirits of the DeadDescended from a long line of gravekeepers for the amidonian royal family, Armon joined King Spiff's expedition as a spiritual advisor and researcher.

characters/ashley.html.title: Ashley
characters/ashley.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 No Ashley is known for being a Vault OverseerThey specialize in DyingPrisoner who was sent to the templars to curry favor.

characters/carl.html.title: Carl
characters/carl.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Brute Strength 🟥 Yes Carl is known for being a Guard CaptainThey specialize in TacticsFormer Mercenary now turned Guard Captain. An effective military leader and warrior. Has superhuman strength due to a pact with a blood demon. Hates Templars.

characters/davelore.html.title: Davelore
characters/davelore.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Internal Power 🟩 No Davelore is known for being a MysticThey specialize in Spiritual RitualsSpifftopian Templar and Spiritual leader of the colony, Davelore maintains the shrine that protects the town from corruption and allows people to be brought back to life

characters/drake.html.title: Drake
characters/drake.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Eagle Eyes 🟥 Yes Drake is known for being an Archeologist, Merchant, Con-man, Architect, Part-time FishThey specialize in Archaeologist / Con-man who came to the colonies to find powerful artifacts & to get away from disgruntled "customers". He then spent a couple millenia as different animals.

characters/jennifer.html.title: Jennifer
characters/jennifer.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 No Jennifer is known for being an InventorThey specialize in GunsmithingGenius inventor who joined the expedition to the Dark Isles in order to make a fortune.

characters/melphizard.html.title: Melphizard
characters/melphizard.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Melphizard is known for being a BlacksmithThey specialize in Sprits/ArtifactsTalented blacksmith who joined the expedition after their master's death to make a name for themselves.

characters/nydid.html.title: Nydid
characters/nydid.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Iron Gut 🟩 No Nydid is known for being a Cook, Guard, StewboyThey specialize in Stews/Mushrooms/AlcoholFormer Spifftopian Templar, now runs a stew shop in a quest to explore the culinary arts

characters/ponk.html.title: Ponk
characters/ponk.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 No Ponk is known for being a Farmer, Brewer, Woodcutter, BuilderThey specialize in Alchemy

characters/sockworthy.html.title: Sockworthy
characters/sockworthy.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Sockworthy is known for being a GovernorThey specialize in ManagementBorn into a noble family, Sockworthy worked as Secretary and Aide for the current Mayor of Spifftopia before being appointed Governor of the colony on the Dark Isles

characters/sola.html.title: Sola
characters/sola.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Sola is known for being a Druid, GuardThey specialize in Nature SpiritsRaised by witches, Sola was captured by the Amidonians, and their guardians were killed, shortly thereafter being bought and freed by Carl.

characters/stephan.html.title: Stephan
characters/stephan.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Stephan is known for being an Investigator, GuardThey specialize in SchizophreniaStephan escaped sevitude as an oarsman on a merchant ship by swimming to shore. After a period living alone in the woods they settled in town

characters/testing.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Nice 🟩 No Testing is known for being a TestThey specialize in Tester

databases/player-structure-database.html.title: Player Structure Database

misc/am-i-missing-a-feature.html.title: Am I missing a feature
misc/am-i-missing-a-feature.html.description:
Information is sourced from a Google Sheet
I can pull this data with a python script It will remove frontmatter elements that are no longer in the google sheet and update the ones that have changed
It can create a new file if a row has been added
It will also copy the Character Icon template to prevent image template loading issues I can update the file template with a python script, meaning any data that is after the template can be saved while still modifying the template for all the Character files
Safety Features: Backup Creation: Before modifying or deleting frontmatter or templates, it would be good practice to create a backup of each markdown file. This way, if an error occurs during the process (or in case of unintended changes), you can easily roll back. Implementation: Create a Backups folder where a timestamped copy of each file is saved before making changes. Validation Before Overwriting: When syncing from Google Sheets, you should validate that the data is correct before overwriting the frontmatter in the markdown files. This could include checks for missing fields, invalid data types, or malformed entries. Implementation: Add a validation step to the Python script that checks for inconsistencies between the Google Sheet data and the expected format. Dry Run Mode: Implement a "dry run" feature in your Python script that will show what changes will be made without actually executing them. This allows you to verify the proposed changes before applying them to the files. Transaction-Like Operation: Ensure that your script performs changes atomically, so if there’s an error partway through an operation (e.g., a failure to copy an image or a permission issue), it rolls back to the original state. Log All Changes: Keep a log of all changes made by your Python script. This could be useful for debugging and tracking what was updated, deleted, or created. Additional Functionality Suggestions: Template Versioning: Implement a version control for your templates. This way, if a template is updated, your script can detect which version is being used in each file and update accordingly, without overwriting custom changes users may have made within individual notes. Automatic Image Resizing/Optimization: When copying the Character Icon template, ensure that the images are optimized for web display (e.g., smaller file size for faster loading). If the original image is too large, consider automatically resizing or compressing it. Sync Status Dashboard: Create a simple dashboard or log output within Obsidian that tracks the sync status for each character file. This can show whether each file is up to date with the latest Google Sheets data, needs updating, or encountered issues during syncing. Conflict Handling: If two users are working on the same file (e.g., modifying the Google Sheet and the Obsidian note simultaneously), your script should have conflict detection and resolution mechanisms (e.g., alerting you to manually review changes).
Copy

misc/project-kanban.html.title: Project Kanban
misc/project-kanban.html.description:
Ideas4Spifftopian Calendar ConverterPython - Safety Features Backups: Create a backup of markdown files before modifying them. Validation: Check Google Sheets data for inconsistencies before overwriting. Dry Run Mode: Preview changes before applying them. Atomic Changes: Ensure changes are rolled back if errors occur.
Logging: Keep a log of all changes made. Templates - Functionality Improvements
Template Versioning: Track template versions and update accordingly. Categorize NPC List by Allegiance+ Add a cardTo Do2Skin the DMsAdd better column data handling - Player Wiki Descriptions - Rename Descriptions to summary, add other column for extra data, auto populate after that+ Add a cardDoing6TEMPLATE - CharacterTEMPLATE - Player StructureTEMPLATE - NPCTEMPLATE - Character WikiGather NPC SkinsGather Player Structure Screenshots+ Add a cardCompleted5Gather Player SkinsFix Icon Shortcodes ScalingGoogle Sheets Sync - gspread - pyamlWikipedia SidepanelTimeline+ Add a card

npcs/alenfar.html.title: Alenfar
npcs/alenfar.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Alenfar is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian TemplarsIn short, they are a Templar LeaderHigh Templar on the Dark Isles, Alenfar oversees a wide ranging extraction operation on the Dark Isles, which has included the import of many convict labourers, including many colonists. This has made him unpopular with the Spifftopians, although his relationship with our town remains on generally amicable terms.

npcs/gutankrt.html.title: Gutankrt
npcs/gutankrt.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Gutankrt is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian InquisitionIn short, they are a Grand InquisitorOne of two Grand inqusitors on the Dark Isles, Gutankrt is supernaturally strong. Generally considered offputting by the colonists, they nevertheless appear to have assisted the colony by using a considerable number of lapis blocks to seal the entrance to falandar proper. Resides in the inquisition's snowy outpost, where they delight in torture and stabbing visitors with a weird stick

npcs/helen.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Helen is an NPC aligned with the Castle StaffIn short, they are a MaidSubject to "Amidonian Conditioning", Helen has effectively had her free will stripped and will follow orders unquestioningly. She was bought from the Merchants by Carl, and was subsequently gifted to the Governor. How she arrived on the Isles as a slave is unknown.

npcs/larden.html.title: Larden
npcs/larden.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Larden is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian TemplarsIn short, they are a ScoutTemplar Scout, and frequent companion of Alenfar, Larden is perceptive and generally no-nonsense.

npcs/leatan.html.title: Leatan
npcs/leatan.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Leatan is an NPC aligned with the FolbfolksIn short, they are a Hippie

npcs/marcus.html.title: Marcus
npcs/marcus.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Marcus is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they are a Cult Leader

npcs/matthew.html.title: Matthew
npcs/matthew.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Matthew is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian TemplarsIn short, they are a Grunt

npcs/nate-asher.html.title: Nate Asher
npcs/nate-asher.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Nate Asher is an NPC aligned with the Castle StaffIn short, they are a SecretaryLongtime friend of the Governor, Nate is a competent secretary with a penchant for bad joke and worse fiction.

npcs/sanderk.html.title: Sanderk
npcs/sanderk.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Sanderk is an NPC aligned with the MerchantsIn short, they are a Trader

npcs/seaserpa.html.title: Seaserpa
npcs/seaserpa.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Seaserpa is an NPC aligned with the MerchantsIn short, they are a LeaderShrewd and dangerous, Seaserpa leads a freeport from which trader capable of running the blockade trade valuable outside goods

npcs/seastik.html.title: Seastik
npcs/seastik.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Seastik is an NPC aligned with the GuardsIn short, they are a DrunkardEx pirate captain who has racked up massive debts to unreputable lenders. He is best known for his drinking problems, his hatred of anyone who gets inbetween him and destroying his liver further, taking the first set of player characters to the island, and drinking. Dislikes authority, especially the Governor, who evicted him from his original shack

npcs/smith.html.title: Smith
npcs/smith.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Smith is an NPC aligned with the HimselfIn short, they are a Wizard

npcs/stefan.html.title: Stefan
npcs/stefan.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None 💀 Dead Stefan is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they were a Grunt

npcs/theockan.html.title: Theockan
npcs/theockan.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Theockan is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian InquisitionIn short, they are a Grand InquisitorThe other Grand Inquisitor, an absolute unit by any normal measurememt except when standing next to Gutankrt. Is generally more sane than his comrade, although he acts more as a subordinate to Gutankrt than an equal, at least in public

npcs/zood.html.title: Zood
npcs/zood.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Zood is an NPC aligned with the GuardsIn short, they are a Drunkard

player-structures/archaeology-department.title: Archaeology Department
player-structures/archaeology-department.description: HomeThe Archaeology Department is known for its purpose of Mapping & Exploration, producing Maps & Locations of Interest. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/armoury.html.title: Armoury
player-structures/armoury.html.description: HomeThe Armoury is known for its purpose of Secure Weapon Storage, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/bakery.html.title: Bakery
player-structures/bakery.html.description: HomeThe Bakery is known for its purpose of Bread (for NPCs), producing Bread. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/bowyer.html.title: Bowyer
player-structures/bowyer.html.description: HomeThe Bowyer is known for its purpose of Bows (for Guards), producing Bows. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/brewery.html.title: Brewery
player-structures/brewery.html.description: HomeThe Brewery is known for its purpose of Alcohol Production, producing Alcohol. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/butcher.html.title: Butcher
player-structures/butcher.html.description: HomeThe Butcher is known for its purpose of Meat Production, producing Meat. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/carpenter.html.title: Carpenter
player-structures/carpenter.html.description: HomeThe Carpenter is known for its purpose of Maintenance, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/castle.html.title: Castle
player-structures/castle.html.description: HomeThe Castle is known for its purpose of Administration, producing N/A. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/castle-kitchen.html.title: Castle Kitchen
player-structures/castle-kitchen.html.description: HomeThe Castle Kitchen is known for its purpose of Feeding NPCs, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/chandler.html.title: Chandler
player-structures/chandler.html.description: HomeThe Chandler is known for its purpose of Candle Production, producing Candles. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/church.html.title: Church
player-structures/church.html.description: HomeThe Church is known for its purpose of Maintaining the Ward, producing N/A. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/coal-mine.html.title: Coal Mine
player-structures/coal-mine.html.description: HomeThe Coal Mine is known for its purpose of Coal Extraction, producing Coal. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/copper-mine.html.title: Copper Mine
player-structures/copper-mine.html.description: HomeThe Copper Mine is known for its purpose of Extracting Copper, producing Copper Ore. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/docks.html.title: Docks
player-structures/docks.html.description: HomeThe Docks is known for its purpose of Fishing, Overseas Trade, producing Fish. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/dovecote.html.title: Dovecote
player-structures/dovecote.html.description: HomeThe Dovecote is known for its purpose of Birb Use, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/dye-workshop.html.title: Dye Workshop
player-structures/dye-workshop.html.description: HomeThe Dye Workshop is known for its purpose of Production of Dyes, producing Dye. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/farm.html.title: Farm
player-structures/farm.html.description: HomeThe Farm is known for its purpose of Food Production, producing 32 Carrots, 64 Potatoes, 64 Wheat, 16 Melons, 16 Pumpkin Seeds, Tea. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/florist.html.title: Florist
player-structures/florist.html.description: HomeThe Florist is known for its purpose of Flower Collection, producing Flowers. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/forrester.html.title: Forrester
player-structures/forrester.html.description: HomeThe Forrester is known for its purpose of Lumber Extraction, producing Logs. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/foundry.html.title: Foundry
player-structures/foundry.html.description: HomeThe Foundry is known for its purpose of Ore Refining, producing Ingots. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/inner-walls.html.title: Inner Walls
player-structures/inner-walls.html.description: HomeThe Inner Walls is known for its purpose of Securing inner Ward, producing N/A. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/iron-mine.html.title: Iron Mine
player-structures/iron-mine.html.description: HomeThe Iron Mine is known for its purpose of Iron Extraction, producing Iron Ore. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/lighthouse.html.title: Lighthouse
player-structures/lighthouse.html.description: HomeThe Lighthouse is known for its purpose of Guiding Ships to Port, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/paper-maker.html.title: Paper Maker
player-structures/paper-maker.html.description: HomeThe Paper Maker is known for its purpose of Producing Paper, producing Paper. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/rot-hut.html.title: Rot Hut
player-structures/rot-hut.html.description: HomeThe Rot Hut is known for its purpose of Composting Rot, producing 8 Rot > 1 Dirt / 4 Rot > 1 Bonemeal / 16 Rot > 1 Mushroom. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/sawmill.html.title: Sawmill
player-structures/sawmill.html.description: HomeThe Sawmill is known for its purpose of Refining Lumber, producing Wood Planks. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/stew-shop.html.title: Stew Shop
player-structures/stew-shop.html.description: HomeThe Stew Shop is known for its purpose of Producing Stew, producing Stew. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/tannery.html.title: Tannery
player-structures/tannery.html.description: HomeThe Tannery is known for its purpose of Producing Leather, producing Leather. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/toolsmith.html.title: Toolsmith
player-structures/toolsmith.html.description: HomeThe Toolsmith is known for its purpose of Producing Tools, producing Tools. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/weaponsmith.html.title: Weaponsmith
player-structures/weaponsmith.html.description: HomeThe Weaponsmith is known for its purpose of Producing Weapons , producing Weapons. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

player-structures/wizard-tower.html.title: Wizard Tower
player-structures/wizard-tower.html.description: HomeThe Wizard Tower is known for its purpose of Smilk Heresy, producing Spider Milk / Evil String. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore: -

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

showFrontmatterTags.description: Show tags that are in the frontmatter

info_includePath.description: The path on the server from which this feature can be loaded

info_showDefaultFolderIcons.description: Show a default icon of a folder for every folder in the tree

info_showDefaultFileIcons.description: Show a default icon of a file for every file in the tree

info_defaultFolderIcon.description: The icon to use for folders. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultFileIcon.description: The icon to use for files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultMediaIcon.description: The icon to use for media files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_exposeStartingPath.description: Whether or not to show the current file in the file tree when the page is first loaded

info_minCollapseDepth.description: The minimum depth at which headings should be collapsed

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the closer connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make the graph appear more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

info_includePath.description: The path on the server from which this feature can be loaded

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded
